> " I intend to finish what I started, I will finish my mission,
> but after that, do not expect me to have the same amount
> of respect for you when this is all over Rodimus. But now,
> is not the time for that. I see that what I accomplished was
> just the first phase. I've accomplished that thus far. I've
> learned for myself what needs to be done, and what needs
> to be done can't be completed today. That will have to wait."
>
>
> " I believe this is where you step asside Rodimus, and let us pass."

Rodimus stood before Tuscon, weapon drawn and ready as the Autobot
went through his soliloquy, the look on his face hard and resolute.
The Rodimus that stands there, is not exactly the Rodimus Tuscon had
once known, the Predacon programing had twisted him, inverted his
thoughts, changed him in ways that even he found surprising in some
ways.

However even now as this lone Autobot spoke about dedication and
courage, there was a part of him that was opened for a moment, as if
for the briefest of seconds a part of the old Rodimus briefly made an
appearance . . .

"NO Autobot, this is where you face termination!" Cyclonus spoke as he
and Scourge caught up, breaking into Rodimus' revelry  "It is time to
finish this!"

"Yes" Said Skorponok as he stepped out of the room, weapons already
orienting on the Autobot. "He thinks he's Optimus Prime" Scorponok
said, his voice sarcastic and mocking, "But he is only a pale copy."
He chuckled, "But I do so look forward to his dissection."

Scourge just chuckled darkly as he approached, his rifle pointed at
Tuscon and Rat Trap!

(Meanwhile in the Autobot shuttle)

> Quickstride gets the shuttle airbourne and sets the course
> for the tower. He tries to lock in on an Autobot signature,
> and gets Rat Trap's readilly.

Lord elder nodded as he brought the shuttle as close as he dared to
the Black Fortress! He knew how powerful this demesne of the Predacons
could be. Designed to hold off an assault, Lord Elder knew his plan
was risky. He could only hope that Rat Trap had been able to do
something on his side.

> "Sir, I've locked in on Rat Trap's signature.... And yes, I do
> see a faint but very faint Autobot signature... It's a bit weaker
> than normal... Which Oh wow, sir, that Autobot seems to be
> using a backup battery... Not good... Because when he loses
> that he's done for."

"Confirmed." he said as he also saw the same things on his scanner.
"The sensors also show several Decepticon and Predacon signatures
around them, if we don't do something Tuscon and Rat trap would be
destroyed anyway." With deft fingers he brought the weapons energy
cannons online and quickly brought them to bear on the fortress.

"Hold onto your seat, this is going to get rough!" Elder said as he
transferred power from the engines to the gunnery platform, in other
words throwing everything the shuttle had at the Fortress!

The shuttle shook for a moment as its fore cannons glowed and then
spewed out a massive burst of energy that bathed the fortress in pure
destructive power!

Back inside the Fortress the very base shook as it absorbed the
massive onslaught from the Autobot shuttle! The lights flickered as
energy fields went down.

Cyclonus, Scourge and Rodimus were knocked off their feet and
Scorponok was sent sailing back into the torture chamber as the world
inside the Fortress went completely dark for a moment and then winked
back on dimly as emergency lights came online.

An alert sounded, it would be only be less than 30 seconds before the
Fortress' computer reset the system and brought itself and all the
bases' systems back on line!

Meanwhile outside Lord Elder struggle frantically to redirect the
shuttle's energy from the weapons and back to the engines, as the
shuttle at the moment was falling from the skies, looking less like
the elegant flying machine it was and more like a brick!

(OOC: I wrote in the affected to the Fortress with Airly's permission)

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclonus & Scourge/Scorponok/Rodimus/Lord Elder)
